email_text:
Subject: Urgent Notice: Temporary Account Suspension

Dear Valued Bank of America Customer,

We regret to inform you that we have detected suspicious activity on your Bank of America account. In order to protect your funds and personal information, we have temporarily suspended your account.

To resolve this issue and restore access to your account, please click on the link below and follow the instructions to verify your identity:

[Phishing link]

Please be advised that failure to verify your identity within 24 hours may result in permanent account suspension. We take the security of our customers very seriously and urge you to act quickly to prevent any unauthorized access to your account.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
Bank of America Customer Service Team

This is an automated email, please do not reply.
